channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-3892|2024-09-17T02:06:07.298Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform%20%28qnx%20sdp%29
item.description: In BlackBerry QNX Software Development Platform (SDP) 6.6.0, an information disclosure vulnerability in the default configuration of the QNX SDP could allow an attacker to gain information relating to memory layout that could be used in a blended attack by executing commands targeting procfs resources.

item.title: CVE-2017-9368|2024-09-17T03:37:37.243Z -- blackberry -- workspaces%20server
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could result in an attacker gaining access to source code for server-side applications by crafting a request for specific files.

item.title: CVE-2017-17442|2024-09-17T03:07:25.995Z -- blackberry -- uem%20management%20console
item.description: In BlackBerry UEM Management Console version 12.7.1 and earlier, a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute script commands in the context of the affected UEM Management Console account by crafting a malicious link and then persuading a user with legitimate access to the Management Console to click on the malicious link.

item.title: CVE-2017-9370|2024-09-17T00:32:13.175Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20workspaces%20server%3B%20watchdox%20by%20blackberry%20server
item.description: An information disclosure / elevation of privilege vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could potentially allow an attacker who has legitimate access to BlackBerry Workspaces to gain access to another user's workspace by making multiple login requests to the server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8889|2024-09-17T00:21:29.633Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20enterprise%20mobility%20server%20%28bems%29
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in the Connect Service of the BlackBerry Enterprise Mobility Server (BEMS) 2.8.17.29 and earlier could allow an attacker to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of a BEMS administrator account.

item.title: CVE-2024-35214|2024-08-20T17:24:53.815Z -- blackberry -- cylanceoptics%20for%20windows
item.description: A tampering vulnerability in the CylanceOPTICS Windows Installer Package of CylanceOPTICS for Windows version 3.2 and 3.3 could allow an attacker to potentially uninstall CylanceOPTICS from a system thereby leaving it with only the protection of CylancePROTECT.

item.title: CVE-2024-35213|2024-06-27T20:11:10.901Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in the SGI Image Codec of QNX SDP version(s) 6.6, 7.0, and 7.1 could allow an attacker to potentially cause a denial-of-service condition or execute code in the context of the image processing process.

item.title: CVE-2024-35213|2024-06-11T18:37:04.161Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in the SGI Image Codec of QNX SDP version(s) 6.6, 7.0, and 7.1 could allow an attacker to potentially cause a denial-of-service condition or execute code in the context of the image processing process.

item.title: CVE-2024-35213|2024-08-02T03:07:46.687Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in the SGI Image Codec of QNX SDP version(s) 6.6, 7.0, and 7.1 could allow an attacker to potentially cause a denial-of-service condition or execute code in the context of the image processing process.

item.title: CVE-2024-35214|2024-08-20T20:09:41.776Z -- blackberry -- cylanceoptics%20for%20windows
item.description: A tampering vulnerability in the CylanceOPTICS Windows Installer Package of CylanceOPTICS for Windows version 3.2 and 3.3 could allow an attacker to potentially uninstall CylanceOPTICS from a system thereby leaving it with only the protection of CylancePROTECT.
